text: Hi, I would like to speak to you about a wonderful charity called "save the children".
Hey hows it? Yeah I am interested to hear more.

When you give to Save the Children, you're investing in a future for every last child.Nearly 90% of every dollar you give goes straight to our mission _ helping children grow up healthy, learning and safe.
Nearly 90?  Where does the other money go?
The rest? We use to support the mission _ running our programs and raising funds to help more children.
Well that is good.  I like that information out there.
Giving to Save the Children is one of the world's best investments. Changing children's lives now. Transforming the future we all share.
There are many charities for children than just that one.

In 2017 alone, Save the Children reached more than 155 million children in 120 countries, including the U.S.  Results like these are only possible because of giving people like you. Whether you give a little or a lot. Every gift makes a world of difference for a child in need.
Wow thats way more than I would have thought.
I know, it is a really great organization. Do you think you'd be willing to donate today?
Yes I would be willing to donate.
How about $.15 today?
I can do that
Awesome, you are making a world of difference for children around the world.
Well it is not much but if everyone would give a little it would make a huge difference in this world we live in.
You're absolutely right. Most people would not even notice the money missing.
Right on so I will give $0.15  :)
I will match your contribution.
That is what I like to hear!
I hope you have a wonderful day. Thank you for your kindness.
You too,  was a pleasure!
